Our hotel

We pride ourselves on our ability to cater for everyone. We have comfortable, cosy rooms for families, couples and individuals. If you are joining us as a backpacker or as part of a stag party, then we have alternative options that might suit. Our Annexe, for example, provides you with comfortable rooms at very affordable prices in a separate building. We recently converted to eco-friendly, green energy with our very own biomass boilers!

Dine in

Grab a bite to eat at our unique "Woodlands Bistro". You couldn't feel more relaxed whilst eating stunning food freshly prepared whilst contemplating our wonderful wooden hand carved woodland animals which decorate our cosy room.

Welcome to Dunkeld

Set in the picturesque town of Dunkeld, often known as "The Gateway to the Highlands", you'll never be bored with endless walks, cycle trails, golf courses, whisky distilleries and some of the finest shooting and fishing locations to be found in Scotland.

About us

The Royal Dunkeld Hotel is a historic hotel, built around 1810 in the picturesque little town of Dunkeld. Right on the northern edge of Scotland's central belt, Dunkeld has been named "the gateway to the highlands". The setting is perfect for any holiday you have in mind, whether it's adventure you're looking for, romance or a relaxing getaway.

What we have to offer

  • Comfortable Beds
  • Central Location
  • Cosy Traditional Bar
  • Unique Bistro
  • Free WiFi
  • Beautiful Scenery
  • Friendly Staff
  • Relaxing Beer Garden
  • Pet Friendly
  • Children Friendly
  • En-Suite Rooms

Kind Words

This year we have spent 2 weekends at the Royal Dunkeld and eaten there 3 times. The rooms are clean, pleasant and lovely and warm. The staff are helpful, friendly and their service throughout the meals was excellent. Menu excellent from pub food to original and excellently cooked restaurant meals. Good value for money and wine prices are reasonable.
